title: Is That A Short Joke!?!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/O7OaXaN.png

seriously rito? 

"short" 

is that all you have to say?

replies.body:
_Estimated Wait Time_
        **Very Tall**
Damn right! Tallest Yordle that ever was.
http://i.imgur.com/JRObRnV.png

_Estimated Wait Time In Units of Latte-Size-You-Will-Need-'Til-This-Is-Over_

There, problem solved.

So we're at 4 times and counting for this joke being posted.

Let's reconvene in a month or so, post it again. Gotta keep it goin'. Keep the world goin' 'round, and everyone knows that what goes around must come back around. Therefore, these jokes must be reposted monthly.

Meh, there will always be people that miss the joke when it comes around.

That isn't to say I think the entire boards should be reposts, but they aren't bad when sprinkled in here and there.

Just downvote and head on your merry way.
More like this is the last hurrah, Teambuilder is going away

Hey, it's like getting slapped by your significant other for checking someone out/answering a question too honestly/forgetting a holiday/bringing up something better left in the past/anything I forgot. Once a month is probably okay and we can still make it work.

Any more than that and it's abuse. Any less than that and I'm probably getting away with something I should be, or some how had a stroke that made me suddenly able to filter the space between my brain and my mouth so that all the stupid doesn't spill out at once.
Mid lane waiting time short ??? what sorcery is this ?
Eigar's unfathomable dark sorcery.
Dirty Rito mocking the master of evil... they will pay!
_WHEN THE TABLE TURNS, YOU WILL SHOW RITO NOOOO MERCY_
IT'S HAPPENING
Nice job reposting and getting little kids up voting you
its only a repost if i've seen it before.
https://gyazo.com/98f875eeb3f4bef8ee6dc2f45f6c80f7
I wish to congratulate you on being downvoted, my friend. It really is an honor.

selected mid and still gets short? 
never happenend to me

The queue estimates wait times on how many times a certain champ in a certain role is accepted in a team, so most mid laners and midlane selected gives 'very short' even tho you'll most likely be waiting for 3 to 5 minutes

On the other hand, if i choose xin support the queue says estimated time: 'very long' and it'll be 10 seconds max
"very short" if you call him a support

It's only a short queue...

IS THAT A SHORT JOKE
AP.
